name: Delusions of a Lost Soul (itch)
description:
Delusions of a Lost Soul is a short adventure-mystery game with horror elements where you play as Benjamin Farwell: a paranormal detective who must return to Lansinet castle to free his partner's soul.

Solve puzzles and release trapped souls to help you on your quest. Uncover the dark mysteries of this ancient castle and discover what really happened to your partner, Ralph.

Languages: English & Spanish (full game only)
